scripts.BAD-dev:server: nodemon -e js,jsx,html --ignore dist --ignore browser/imported.js --exec 'npm run build && npm run start'
scripts.create-bundle:client: cross-env BABEL_ENV=client parcel build browser/index.html -d dist/client --public-url /
scripts.create-bundle:server: cross-env BABEL_ENV=server parcel build server.js -d dist/server --public-url /dist --target=node
